apr_memcache API.

apr_memcache API unit tests.

creator: joshrotenberg@gmail.com

text:
Committed in r42358, although i had to if'def out the actual test cases, since
we cannot assume a memcached instance is online on localhost for the test suite
to run.
creator: chip@force-elite.com

text:
Created attachment 20495
apr_memcache API unit tests.

OK, this version adds a check for a running memcached on localhost:11211 before
trying the tests, and skips them if one is not found. it also adds some trivial
tests for the new server_func and hash_func stuff.
creator: joshrotenberg@gmail.com
